meanings.definition: Make a loud, long, mournful cry like that of a cat.
meanings.sent1: The cat was yowling outside my window all night.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat kept yowling for food.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't sleep because the cat was yowling a sad song.
meanings.sent4: The wind yowling through the trees sounded like a cat in distress.
meanings.sent5: The yowling of the cat echoed through the empty alleyway.
